QuestData.Title: More Basilisk Eyes
QuestData.CompletionText: It takes many basilisk eyes to make even a small dose of Voren'thal's elixir. Bringing me more would certainly incur the Scryers' favor.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $N. Voren'thal's visions might one day decide the fate of our race. It would behoove us to do our best to ensure that those visions are as accurate as possible.$B$B<This quest can be repeated up to Neutral reputation.>
